org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.exist
Class AeDelegatingExistConnection

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.exist.AeDelegatingExistConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeExistConnection, IAeXMLDBConnection
public abstract class AeDelegatingExistConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeExistConnection

Delegating implementation of an exist connection - delegates all calls to the delegate connection.
